Devour.help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes, increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Devour.targetHelp: A portion of your life force has been devoured!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Devour2.help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Note that Devour is unaffected by Range changes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Devour2.targetHelp: A portion of your life force has been devoured!

Infection.help: Your Defense and Damage Resistance are reduced by 1/3 per stack of this power. Recharge: Moderate

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} infects you, reducing your Damage Resistance and Defenses.

Cripple_Tell.help: The Avatar's ectoplasmic fluid has the ability to drain the energy out of an individual. It can, however, be avoided, as it can only affect targets in a narrow cone in front of it. Note that Preparing to Cripple is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow
Cripple_Tell.attackerAttackFloater: The Avatar Prepares to Cripple the Group! Get Behind the Avatar!

Cripple.help: The Avatar's ectoplasmic fluid has the ability to drain the energy out of an individual. The affected target is drained of all Endurance and receives a debuff to Recharge Rate and Recovery for 15s. Though this can be devastating, Cripple can be avoided, as it can only affect targets in a narrow cone in front of it. Recharge: Slow
Cripple.targetHelp: The Avatar's ectoplasmic fluid has the ability to drain the energy out of an individual. It can, however, be avoided, as it can only affect targets in a narrow cone in front of it.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} cripples you, reducing your Endurance and Recovery, while lengthening Recharge Time.

Corruption.help: The Avatar is uniquely attuned to Desdemona's magic through his defeat of Vanessa. He will continuously do damage to her as long as the battle rages. This damage in increased by the number of allies she is currently protecting with her Ember Shroud, as this weakens her personal defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Unique3 damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Unique3 damage.

Grasp_of_Gaea.help: You are being consumed by the Will of the Earth. The Avatar of Hamidon will draw life essence from your location in six seconds. Stand apart from allies to help survive the blast! Recharge: Slow
Grasp_of_Gaea.attackerAttackFloater: Avatar channels the Will of the Earth! Spread away from the target!

messages.float: {PlayerDest} is being consumed by the Earth!

messages.victimHit: You suffer a final burst from {PowerName} and suffer {Damage} points of annihilative damage.
